title: Region lock OCE
body: I believe we should region lock the Oceanic region, there is just way too many toxic non English speaking SEA/Chinese players coming to the region after being banned in their own region, the worst part is they can flame all they like in their own native language and not be penalised for doing so due to the server being an English speaking one, they not only cannot effectively communicate with the team but they bring down the game with how toxic they are.

replies.body: ?? you dont agree that this sounds racist?? even his name is clearly pushing the boundaries of racism

hi I'm neegor and Asians are bad, lol, guys just a troll.

funny stuff.

It isnt racist, he is stating some concerns of why those players are a problem. 

Ok, now you tell me what he've typed that was racist eh? Dont even list his name. Give me some real arguement.

He is implying that basically all asians who come to this server are all toxic and none of them speak any English. Truthfully, they mostly speak their language to see if anyone else in game can speak it with them. Nothing wrong with that.

>basically all asians who come to this server are all toxic and none of them speak any English

That was not the point, it only directed at the ones who are toxic. And there are plenty of those kids.

>Truthfully, they mostly speak their language to see if anyone else in game can speak it with them. Nothing wrong with that.

Those players you are refering to; Most of them are playing at an internet cafe while boasting to their friends that they know english; And to demonstrate, they swears in english, calling people dog, pig and other lowly animals. Aswell as targeting the parent or sibbling. 

And when they typed in characters, you can be sure if it's a losing game. 70% of those are insults meant for the intended target.

Again, let me reiterate, not all of them. But most of them.

Whilst I dont necessarily agree with region locking, I will add that the single time I translated pre-game lobby when I had 4 chinese players they were talking about how they were going to "fuck with this oce guy" by stealing blue on leash

I have no issue with Asians living in the OCE region playing LoL on the OCE server.

But for us to be a dumpster for all the trash that gets banned from the Asian servers, no thank you.

I agree only in that if they got banned on their own server, they shouldn't be able to make a new account on this one. However there is 0 wrong with people who can put up with the ping difference playing on any server they want. You say they can't communicate, but that is what smart pings are for. And I would 100% of the time rather have someone on my team who is quiet because they don't speak English than have someone who is ragey and flames people for no reason.

I agree completely, i'm yet to play with a single off-shorer that isn't toxic, and i play with a lot

Region Lock it so NZ/AU/Islanders are the only ones able to play. Force the banned trash to find a different server and the rest to go home, and get out of AU
